text: puokke ban niyeay knea tha chaur puok anak sbath nung a l laoh tha yeung pitchea nung samleab ke( sa leh) ning krom kruosaear robsa ke(now yb nih) . banteabmk yeung nung brab sachnheate robsa ke tha puok yeung min bankheunh kar slab nei krom kruosaear robsa ke laey haey pitabrakd nasa puok yeung chea puok del niyeay pit
